00022 #include "mas5-stat/src/ExpressionAlgorithmImplementation.h"
00023 //
00024 #include <cstring>
00025 #include <string.h>

00027 
00028 std::string get_file(int argc, char *argv[], int &i)
00029 {
00030         std::string file = "";
00031 
00032         // Get the file name.
00033         int j=i+1;
00034         while (j<argc && argv[j][0] != '-')
00035         {
00036                 file += argv[j];
00037                 if (j<argc-1 && argv[j+1][0] != '-')
00038                         file += " ";
00039                 ++j;
00040         }
00041         i = j-1;
00042 
00043         return file;
00044 }
00045 
00046 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00047 {
00048         CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation exp;
00049         CExpStatAlgSettings &params = exp.GetParameters();
00050 
00051         // Get the inputs from the command line.
00052         std::string cdfFile;
00053         std::string celFile;
00054         std::string baselineFile;
00055         bool writeCell = false;
00056         std::string outputDir;
00057         int i=1;
00058         while(i<argc)
00059         {
00060                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-cdf") == 0)
00061                         cdfFile = get_file(argc, argv, i);
00062 
00063                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-i") == 0)
00064                         celFile = get_file(argc, argv, i);
00065 
00066                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-b") == 0)
00067                         baselineFile = get_file(argc, argv, i);
00068 
00069                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-Alpha1") == 0)
00070                         params.Alpha1 = atof(argv[i+1]);
00071 
00072                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-Alpha2") == 0)
00073                         params.Alpha2 = atof(argv[i+1]);
00074 
00075                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-Tau") == 0)
00076                         params.Tau = atof(argv[i+1]);
00077 
00078                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-TGT") == 0)
00079                         params.TGT = atof(argv[i+1]);
00080 
00081                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-Gamma1H") == 0)
00082                         params.Gamma1H = atof(argv[i+1]);
00083 
00084                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-Gamma1L") == 0)
00085                         params.Gamma1L = atof(argv[i+1]);
00086 
00087                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-Gamma2H") == 0)
00088                         params.Gamma2H = atof(argv[i+1]);
00089 
00090                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-Gamma2L") == 0)
00091                         params.Gamma2L = atof(argv[i+1]);
00092 
00093                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-Perturbation") == 0)
00094                         params.Perturbation = atof(argv[i+1]);
00095 
00096                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-SFMethod") == 0)
00097                         params.SFMethod = (CExpStatAlgSettings::ScalingOptionsEnum) atoi(argv[i+1]);
00098 
00099                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-NormMethod") == 0)
00100                         params.NormMethod = (CExpStatAlgSettings::NormalizationOptionsEnum) atoi(argv[i+1]);
00101 
00102                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-NormFactor") == 0)
00103                         params.NormFactor = atof(argv[i+1]);
00104 
00105                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-ScaleFactor") == 0)
00106                         params.ScaleFactor = atof(argv[i+1]);
00107 
00108                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-ScaleProbeSet") == 0)
00109                         params.ScaleGenes.push_back(get_file(argc, argv, i));
00110 
00111                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-NormProbeSet") == 0)
00112                         params.NormGenes.push_back(get_file(argc, argv, i));
00113 
00114                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-write-cell") == 0)
00115                         writeCell = true;
00116 
00117                 else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-out-dir") == 0)
00118                         outputDir = get_file(argc, argv, i);
00119         
00120                 ++i;
00121         }
00122 
00123 
00124 
00125         ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00126         ////
00127         //// Run the expression algorithm.
00128         ////
00129         ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00130     if (exp.RunStat(celFile.c_str(), baselineFile.c_str(), cdfFile.c_str()) == false)
00131         {
00132                 std::cerr << exp.GetError() << endl;
00133                 return 0;
00134         }
00135 
00136         // Output the background zone information
00137         std::cout << "Number of Zones=" << exp.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().number_zones << endl;
00138         std::cout << "Smooth factor=" << exp.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().smooth_factor << endl;
00139         if (exp.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().pZones != NULL)
00140         {
00141                 for (int iZone=0; iZone<exp.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().number_zones; ++iZone)
00142                 {
00143                         std::cout << "Zone" << iZone << "X=" << exp.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().pZones[iZone].center.x << endl;
00144                         std::cout << "Zone" << iZone << "Y=" << exp.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().pZones[iZone].center.y << endl;
00145                         std::cout << "Zone" << iZone << "B=" << exp.GetBackgroundZoneInfo().pZones[iZone].background << endl;
00146                 }
00147                 std::cout << endl;
00148         }
00149 
00150         // Output the header
00151         std::cout << "Name" << "\t";
00152         std::cout << "Signal" << "\t";
00153         std::cout << "Detection" << "\t";
00154         std::cout << "p-value" << "\t";
00155         std::cout << "pairs" << "\t";
00156         std::cout << "pairs used";
00157         if (exp.DoesCompDataExists() == true)
00158         {
00159                 std::cout << "\t";
00160                 std::cout << "Change" << "\t";
00161                 std::cout << "Change p-value" << "\t";
00162                 std::cout << "SLR" << "\t";
00163                 std::cout << "SLR-Low" << "\t";
00164                 std::cout << "SLR-High" << "\t";
00165                 std::cout << "Common";
00166         }
00167         std::cout << endl;
00168 
00169 
00170         // Output the results.
00171         int n=exp.GetNumResults();
00172         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00173         {
00174                 AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *abs_result = exp.GetAbsStatResult(i);
00175                 std::cout << exp.GetProbeSetName(i) << "\t";
00176                 std::cout << abs_result->Signal << "\t";
00177                 std::cout << ExpressionAbsCallString[abs_result->Detection] << "\t";
00178                 std::cout << abs_result->DetectionPValue << "\t";
00179                 std::cout << abs_result->NumPairs << "\t";
00180                 std::cout << abs_result->NumUsedPairs;
00181 
00182                 if (exp.DoesCompDataExists() == true)
00183                 {
00184                         CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *comp_result = exp.GetCompStatResult(i);
00185                         std::cout << "\t";
00186                         std::cout << ExpressionCompCallString[comp_result->Change] << "\t";
00187                         std::cout << comp_result->ChangePValue << "\t";
00188                         std::cout << comp_result->SignalLogRatio << "\t";
00189                         std::cout << comp_result->SignalLogRatioLow << "\t";
00190                         std::cout << comp_result->SignalLogRatioHigh << "\t";
00191                         std::cout << comp_result->NumCommonPairs;
00192                 }
00193                 std::cout << endl;
00194         }
00195         std::cout << endl;
00196 
00197         // Output the rawq information
00198         std::cout << "RawQ\t" << exp.GetRawQ() << endl;
00199 
00200         // Output the bg stats
00201         AvgStdvMinMaxType bg = exp.GetBgStats();
00202         std::cout << "BG Avg\t" << bg.avg << endl;
00203         std::cout << "BG Stdv\t" << bg.stdv << endl;
00204         std::cout << "BG Min\t" << bg.min << endl;
00205         std::cout << "BG Max\t" << bg.max << endl;
00206 
00207         // Output the noise stats
00208         AvgStdvMinMaxType noise = exp.GetNoiseStats();
00209         std::cout << "Noise Avg\t" << noise.avg << endl;
00210         std::cout << "Noise Stdv\t" << noise.stdv << endl;
00211         std::cout << "Noise Min\t" << noise.min << endl;
00212         std::cout << "Noise Max\t" << noise.max << endl;
00213 
00214         // The control information.
00215         ControlInformationList &controls = exp.GetControlInfo();
00216         ControlInformationList::iterator iter;
00217         for (iter=controls.begin(); iter!=controls.end(); iter++)
00218         {
00219                 ControlInformationType info = *iter;
00220                 switch (info.qcType)
00221                 {
00222                 case affxcdf::CheckerboardPositiveQCProbeSetType:
00223                         std::cout << "Corner+\t";
00224                         break;
00225 
00226                 case affxcdf::CheckerboardNegativeQCProbeSetType:
00227                         std::cout << "Corner-\t";
00228                         break;
00229 
00230                 case affxcdf::CentralCrossPositiveQCProbeSetType:
00231                         std::cout << "Central+\t";
00232                         break;
00233 
00234                 case affxcdf::CentralCrossNegativeQCProbeSetType:
00235                         std::cout << "Central-\t";
00236                         break;
00237 
00238                 default:
00239                         break;
00240                 }
00241                 std::cout << info.avg << "\t" << info.count << endl;
00242         }
00243 
00244 
00245         return 0;
00246 }
